content: **lace into spring 2026 mystery knit-along entry remastered pdf bundle ** master the art of delicate texture with the lace into spring mystery knit-along elevate your knitting practice this year with a collection designed to celebrate the elegance of lace this **13-week** journey features **20 exquisite designs** curated to help you create a large heirloom-quality throw **a note for our long-time knitters ** this 2026 collection is a remastered edition it features 16 lace classics originally shared in 2020 now fully updated and redrawn for modern clarity plus 4 brand-new mystery designs exclusive to this year s event **already have the 2020 version ** check your email i have sent a loyalty discount code to all previous buyers as a thank you for your continued support use it at checkout to upgrade to the full 2026 remastered experience **what s included in the 2026 entry ** * 20 total designs 16 revised classics + 4 brand-new 2026 exclusives * professional charts every chart has been redrawn in high-contrast for easier reading and printing * updated instructions written directions have been refined and tidied for absolute accuracy * complete resource guide includes the new 2026 **welcome & summary** and the comprehensive **chart symbols & abbreviations guide** > note this is a digital subscription > new patterns will be added to your > account weekly starting january 22nd > pattern club+ members receive this > entry as part of their membership language english you re welcome to join our ravelry group 1 to chat and share your progress ----------------- **free access ** every pattern will be available for **free** on the blog for the duration of the kal 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/oh-la-lanas-kals
